    Package Description
    abalone

    • Uses of ClientUnavailableException in abalone

      Methods in abalone that throw ClientUnavailableException 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void Game.addMove​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String direction, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> indexes)
      Will check if the player is on turn and check if the move is valid, will move if both true.
      void Game.checkScore()
      checks if a player /team has reached the score limit, if it is reached, the game finished message will be send.

    • Uses of ClientUnavailableException in abalone.server

      Methods in abalone.server that throw ClientUnavailableException 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void AbaloneServer.echo​(java.lang.String msg)
      send a message to all the connected clients.
      void AbaloneServer.multipleSend​(java.lang.String msg, java.lang.String[] players)
      sends a message to multiple clients .
      void AbaloneClientHandler.sendIllegalMoveException​(java.lang.String reason)
      send an IllegalMoveException message to the connected client.
      void AbaloneClientHandler.sendMessage​(java.lang.String msg)
      sends the given message to the client.
